results.content: Christian Hur is an excellent teach and course designer. My Angular skills soared upon taking this course.   Thank you Christian and Udemy for this lecture.

results.content: Very good course having completed pre-angular 7 portion first. Walks thru essentials, newsapi for data, hosting at google/Firebase. All works fine.  Will update again after completing the angular 7 new features soon.
